de.unifrankfurt.informatik.dbis.dia.annotation

Annotation Type Variable


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=FIELD)
public @interface Variable
    Defines a variable in the context of the generated SPARQL-Statement.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String name
      The name of the variable.
      TriplePattern triple
      The TriplePattern defining in which context this variable stands to the entire graph.
      NodeType type
      The type of the containing value.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean optional
      Deprecated. 
      see bachelor thesis for further details.

    • Element Detail

      • name

        public abstract java.lang.String name
        The name of the variable.

      • type

        public abstract NodeType type
        The type of the containing value. If the type is of NodeType.INT, the underlying field has to be of type Integer, too.

      • triple

        public abstract TriplePattern triple
        The TriplePattern defining in which context this variable stands to the entire graph.

      • optional

        @Deprecated
public abstract boolean optional
        Deprecated. see bachelor thesis for further details.
        SHOULD NOT BE USED!
        Default:
        false
